profile.name: Donato Perconti
profile.designation: Engineering Executive | Health, Wellness, and Fintech
profile.bio:
Engineering leader with more than 10 years of experience building and scaling high-performing teams in fintech, health, and wellness. Proven ability to grow organizations, deliver business-aligned products, and create a culture of purpose-driven innovation. Expertise in payments, platform engineering, AI features, and data systems.

I'm also the creator of [With Light](http://withlight.ai/), an app that empowers emotional wellness with DBT & AI. Build resilience, regulate emotions, and find balance with Dialectical Behavior Therapy tools and guided AI coaching.
